_contained.description: Whether to return resources contained in other resources in the search matches

_containedType.description: If returning contained resources, whether to return the contained or container resources

_elements.description: Request that only a specific set of elements be returned for resources

_graph.description: Include additional resources according to a GraphDefinition

_include.description: Other resources to include in the search results that search matches point to

_maxresults.description: Hint to a server that only the first 'n' results will ever be processed

_revinclude.description: Other resources to include in the search results when they refer to search matches

_sort.description: Order to sort results in (can repeat for inner sort orders)

_summary.description: Just return the summary elements (for resources where this is defined)

_total.description: Request a precision of the total number of results for a request
